text: Asɨzir atiar kɨ datɨrɨghɨn garir kam, a kaziar atiar ekiar me kamaghɨn dɨborim lepat, an a mɨn gari. Ezɨ an sueba, asɨzir atiar kurar me kamaghɨn dɨborim bea, an an suebar mɨn gari. Egha an akam laionɨn akamɨn mɨn gari. Ezɨ asɨzir atiar kam, kuruzim uan gavgavim ko atrivir dabirabim ko bizibagh ativamin gavgavir ekiam, a ganɨngi.
